misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a distinguished member of Golf Pirkkala, hails from the vibrant city of Tampere, Finland. Known for his contemplative approach to the game, Ofri brings a unique blend of precision and strategy to the course.

A dedicated competitor, Ofri is preparing to make his third appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy remain elusive, his consistent performance and unwavering commitment mark him as a formidable player to watch.

Off the course, Ofri is known to appreciate the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen, whose creative vision will be sorely missed after his passing in 2024. Ofri believes that Kosti's designs provided a unique challenge that required both skill and intelligence to overcome.
